SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT cpi.*, rownum rnum FROM tl_b_clinic_patient_info cpi
WHERE cpi.name LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR TO_CHAR(cpi.birth, 'yyMMdd') LIKE #{searchWord}
ORDER BY cpi.name ASC )t1
WHERE t1.rnum >= (#{pageNumber}-1)*20 + 1 AND t1.rnum <= #{pageNumber}*20
